channel.title: How to communicate between classes?
channel.description:
Hi,
I've got a problem, i want to make player.java (class) give the player 1 agility experience when running, for each % the player ran.
Player.java -> Client.java The problem is, that i dont know how to communicate betweem the two calsses.
I've tried server.clientHandler.addSkillXP(...); also tried just addSkillXP(...) Tried a few more ways, but neither of them worked. How do i do this?
I'm able to use player.java from client.java, but not vice versa.
Any ideas?

item.title: How to communicate between classes?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Hi,

I’ve got a problem, i want to make player.java (class) give the player 1 agility experience when running, for each % the player ran.
